contentList.content: Take only half the damage from Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing attacks. The duration of Blade Ward is reduced by 1 whenever the creature takes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage.
Has Resistance against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage from attacks. When Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage is taken from an attack, the duration of Blade Ward is reduced by 1.
Has Resistance against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage from attacks.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against a non-hostile creature in dialogue. When targetting a hostile creature in combat, they must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you.
The caster of this charm has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against the creature.
Project a cone of noxious gas, leaving behind a cloud of poison.

Engulf a target in a flame-like radiance. If the target is a Fiend, or Undead, they are afflicted with Holy Fire.

Targeting the ground directly will create a holy fire surface.

Your staff, club, mace, javelin, dart, spear, or trident becomes magical: it deals [1], and uses your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls.

Damage begins at [1], and increases to [2] at level 5, then again to [3] at level 10.

Creature's weapon is magical and deals [1]. Attack Rolls use the wielder's Spellcasting Ability Modifier.

Damage begins at [1], increasing to [2] at level 5, [3] at level 11, and [4] at level 17.
Dispel your equipped weapon's Shillelagh enchantment.

If the target creature fails an Intelligence Saving Throw, the caster gains Advantage on their next Attack Roll against the target.

Additionally, the target's Armour Class is reduced equal to your Proficiency Bonus, or half of your your Proficiency Bonus on a successful save. Whenever the target is attacked this effect and its duration is reduced by 1.
<LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is reduced by the duration of the effect. Whenever the creature is attacked the duration is reduced by 1.
